short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Harry Potter Chibi Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Harry Potter Chibi background. Cute Harry Potter Chibi theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically cycle through Harry Potter Chibi wallpapers with each new tab.
2. Switch up your Harry Potter Chibi background or pin your favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Easy bookmark access.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Fast access to Google apps.
11. Easy navigation to more theme options.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Instant downloads for new wallpapers.
14. Quick links to gaming portals.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Harry Potter Chibi new tab.
